tool_description: Monitors battery charge levels and estimates runtime for cameras, flashes, and other electronic equipment based on usage patterns.

device_types.description: Types of devices to monitor (camera, flash, audio_recorder, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid duration: Event duration must be between 1 and 24 hours.
Unknown device type: Use recognized device types like camera, flash, audio_recorder, led_panel.
No devices specified: Provide at least one device type to monitor.
usage: Specify the device types you'll be using and the expected event duration. The tool will assess current battery levels and runtime estimates.

battery_status.description: Current charge levels for each device

runtime_estimates.description: Estimated runtime hours for each device

charging_needed.description: Whether additional charging is required before the event
